DOC.brief_summary: To investigate steady-state pharmacokinetics once-daily twice-daily regimen BIA 2-093 twice-daily regimen Oxcarbazepine ( Trileptal® ) healthy subject assess tolerability regimens healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Steady-state Pharmacokinetics BIA 2-093 Oxcarbazepine Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Single centre , open-label , randomised , three-way crossover study 12 healthy volunteer . The study consist three 8-day treatment period separate washout period 10-15 day . On treatment period volunteer receive either daily oral dose BIA 2-093 900 mg once-daily ( od ) , BIA 2-093 450 mg twice-daily ( bid ) , Oxcarbazepine ( Trileptal® ) 450 mg bid .
